status_bar.exceeded_resource_limit_description: Please contact your service administrator to continue using the service.
status_bar.exceeded_resource_limit_title: Your message wasn't sent because this homeserver has exceeded a resource limit.
status_bar.failed_to_create_room_title: Could not start a chat with this user
status_bar.homeserver_blocked_title: Your message wasn't sent because this homeserver has been blocked by its administrator.
status_bar.monthly_user_limit_reached_title: Your message wasn't sent because this homeserver has hit its Monthly Active User Limit.
status_bar.requires_consent_agreement_title: You can't send any messages until you review and agree to our terms and conditions.
status_bar.select_messages_to_retry: You can select all or individual messages to retry or delete
status_bar.server_connectivity_lost_description: Sent messages will be stored until your connection has returned.
status_bar.server_connectivity_lost_title: Connectivity to the server has been lost.
status_bar.some_messages_not_sent: Some of your messages have not been sent

a11y.unsent_message: Open room %(roomName)s with an unsent message.

empty.no_chats_description: Get started by messaging someone or by creating a room
empty.no_favourites: You don't have favourite chats yet
empty.no_favourites_description: You can add a chat to your favourites in the chat settings
empty.no_invites: You don't have any unread invites
empty.no_lowpriority: You don't have any low priority rooms
empty.no_mentions: You don't have any unread mentions
empty.no_people: You don’t have direct chats with anyone yet
empty.no_people_description: You can deselect filters in order to see your other chats
empty.no_rooms: You’re not in any room yet
empty.no_rooms_description: You can deselect filters in order to see your other chats
empty.no_unread: Congrats! You don’t have any unread messages

decryption_failure.blocked: The sender has blocked you from receiving this message because your device is unverified
decryption_failure.historical_event_no_key_backup: Historical messages are not available on this device
decryption_failure.historical_event_unverified_device: You need to verify this device for access to historical messages
decryption_failure.historical_event_user_not_joined: You don't have access to this message
